author: quintonm
msg: Removed check that caused a return is the user object was in the session.  The original comments
on this said it was to prevent an additional database hit the second time the action was called
but this does nto happened anymore.
The documentation about the user being removed from the session before the login action is
executed was also removed since this is not true any longer.

author: henning
msg: Change the formatString method to remove the .x and .y parts even when
url folding == none, just as suggested by Peter Courcoux.

author: quintonm
msg: The test for anonymous user is now if user.getName() is not empty.

author: quintonm
msg: TurbineUser now overrides getName and setName from SecurityObject.  This makes it behave more
like the other subclasses of SecurityObject.

author: henning
msg: Yet another artefact from the old build system.
